#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Install database-diagram =

To install database-diagram you will also need:

jQuery 1.3.2, flydom 3.1.1 and jQuery UI 1.7.2 (lightness)

These .js files are expected in the js folder:

* jquery-1.3.2.min.js
* jquery.flydom-3.1.1.js
* jquery-ui-1.7.2.custom.min.js

So your final directory structure will look like this:

{{{
js/
  jquery.flydom-3.1.1.js
  jquery-1.3.2.min.js
  jquery-ui-1.7.2.custom.min.js

css/ui-lightness/
  jquery-ui-1.7.2.custom.css

css/ui-lightness/images
  (lots of images)
}}}
